protein.specific_function: Rab GTPase effector involved in the late steps of regulated exocytosis, both in endocrine and exocrine cells. Acts as a potential RAB3B effector protein in epithelial cells

reference.reference_text: Smith JS, Tachibana I, Allen C, Chiappa SA, Lee HK, McIver B, Jenkins RB, Raffel C: Cloning of a human ortholog (RPH3AL) of (RNO)Rph3al from a candidate 17p13.3 medulloblastoma tumor suppressor locus. Genomics. 1999 Jul 1;59(1):97-101.
